Good Comments: Overall low quality and often nonsensical. Seriously, dog barks need not be translated...
good translation, not so good video + very slow
Inconsistent, poorly timed every now and then, unprofessional at times. Got better as time passed, but their fonts for subs are sometimes really ugly and hard to read.
Um, same thing as "Kaitou and Hubuki."
Bad Comments: I like the additional kanji subtitles, increases re-watch value for someone learning Japanese in context. This is definitely a hardworking fansub group!
Poor typesetting, occasionally odd timing. Script is decent enough, but M-L's scripts are definitely better. M-L also has higher quality encoding than them.
